data.name: Tremen
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Tremen, a universe created by Pim Bos.

Originally a series of published comic books, Tremen is now coming as an interactive experience.

Tremen is an atmospheric 3rd person action-adventure game with a mature setting. Expect combat, environmental puzzles and lore rich environments to explore.

After Rumpert's plane is taken down he has to survive the unforgiving wasteland and make it to the nearest settlement for help. Follow his journey through the wasteland and cities to find out why his ship was taken down.

content_descriptors.notes:
Tremen includes some violent/gory combat scenes and environments.

Some of the story and characters describe and participate in drug use.
